Package scene

Class SceneBuilder

java.lang.Object
scene.SceneBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Builder
public class SceneBuilder extends Object implements Builder
A builder class for constructing a 3D scene with a camera, image, colors, objects, and lights.
